tax evasion.description: Increase the time before you can be taxed again by 30 seconds (used immediately on purchase)

reset.description: Adds a reset option in black jack (can only be  used once per game)

intrude.description: Type join to join a battle mid game

loan.description: Gives you enough money to get to $1, with a maximum of however much money first place has

tax shield.description: Prevents getting taxed into the negatives

bone.description: Restore randomly 3-7 hunger to a pet of your  choice

puffle chat.description: get an extra .01% every minute talking
